title: Supervised Locally Linear Embedding

The feature extraction process is illustrated in Figure 1: the C = 3 classes in the iris data set [1] are mapped onto single points by 1-SLLE. #-SLLE retains some of the class structure, but reduces within-class dispersion compared to LLE.
